name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
description:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Lemniscatic Wind Cycling: Spend 1 less Anemo Die.
Usage(s): 2

When Yaksha's Mask is no longer attached to the character: Remove this effect.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses a $[S15042]: </color>Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo Die</color>.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

<color=#FFFFFFFF>When $[C115041] is no longer attached to the character: </color>Remove this effect.
